title: Association
para: Association plays a very important role in shaping the character and destiny of a person. This is because of the fact that association is a medium for knowledge transmission which results in thoughtful discussions eventually leading to transformation.

title: Community Building
para: Due to lack of training and ego-centric attitude, modern people find it easy to work individually but not as a team. Regular value based activities will help people come together for a common cause.

title: Preserving Culture
para: Education through cultural rehabilitation (creating an atmosphere to facilitate natural and appropriate system of value education.

title: Sense of Responsibility
para: Training and educating to make evey youth responsible citizens of the country. Responsible citizens are the abstract assets of the country which help the nation excel in all phases of development.

title: Role Model and Inspirational Leadership
para: Creating exemplary youth leaders for the society who may facilitate the development of new enthusiastic youth to create new opportunities and avenues.

title: Promote Value Centered lifestyle
para: Values are the priceless gems which enhance the personality of a human being. Values make life meaningful therefore every smallest effort to add some value in the life is a transformational effort.
